name: Robots Stole My Hat!
description:
You play as a teleporting detective P. Lace Holder, whose investigation against robot mafia ended with him almost killed and thrown into the river. Now your only purpose is to destroy those criminals, and reclaim your favorite hat! You only have two weapons: plasma revolver, and mad teleport skills.

Done as a coursework during 5th semester of IT studies at Łódź University of Technology.

Credits
  • Kamil Kozłowski
  • Jakub Rogalski
  • Bogna Dudaczyk
  • Karolina Drobnik
